0ffa2599f9a060ddceb48808b9b1dc9c90eec51b.query:
select
                p.user_id as user_id,
                p.username as "username",
                array_agg(f.checked order by f.position asc) as hits
            from 
                bingo.players as p
            join bingo.fields as f on f.user_id = p.user_id
            join bingo.field_templates as ft on f.field_template_id = ft.id
            where 
                p.game_id = $1 and f.game_id = $1
            group by p.user_id, p.username
            order by array_agg(f.checked) desc

1c2ff520475eaeda76903e12795f1ab4046e1c7e.query:
select
                g.id as id,
                g.game_template_id as game_template_id
            from 
                bingo.fields as f
            inner join 
                bingo.games as g on f.game_id = g.id
            where 
                f.id = $1 and f.user_id = $2 and g.closed = false

3a04c1684e0ff0b2c7f25762f536670eb84e2e8f.query: update bingo.fields set checked = not checked where id = $1

545da3b7b19b85e143c8a58617e0e96850bb6a3c.query: select id from identity.users where id = $1

5655bb3552a00ef2fe8a5e38cfed7daf5964c829.query:
insert into bingo.fields (game_id, field_template_id, position, user_id)
                values ($1, $2, $3, $4)

7d5b6f0f1c41caee66e924b82a45bde1d93b8d18.query:
select id
                                from identity.users
                                where id = $1

8339fb9b6afcaae4f89044d06d3af69e2cdc18ea.query:
select * from bingo.game_templates
                where id = $1 and (created_by = $2 or approved = true)

84adaf0a986b4b46601e8047f8ea9cce5c95daf0.query:
select
                g.id,
                g.access_code
            from bingo.games g
            join bingo.players p on p.game_id = g.id
            where 
                g.game_template_id = $1
                and p.user_id = $2

874e5bb24d6bc731431cf1e918edd80aafb3ec67.query:
select * from (
                select
                    distinct on(gt.id) gt.id,
                    gt.title,
                    count(ft.id) as field_amount,
                    gt.created_by = $1 as owned
                from
                    bingo.game_templates as gt
                    join bingo.field_templates as ft on ft.game_template_id = gt.id
                group by
                    gt.id
            ) as sq
            order by sq.owned desc

a60615289f7b114a5201ac16c45127f2d5184a3a.query:
insert into bingo.game_templates (title, "language", created_by)
            values ($1, $2, $3) returning id

a6c559839f7b7f5fd053c732f6b9f2ab9ae49f62.query:
select 
                f.id
            from bingo.fields as f
            inner join bingo.field_templates as ft 
                on f.field_template_id = ft.id
            where 
                f.game_id = $1 and f.user_id = $2
            order by 
                position

c57f316f4689728bba631b65cd3c81640899b3c1.query:
select 
                    g.game_template_id
                from 
                    bingo.games g
                inner join
                    bingo.players p on p.game_id = g.id
                where 
                    p.user_id = $1 and g.id = $2 and closed = false

ca63f019e692fa1133a6e1c01852b930cfd4ea48.query:
select 
                    gt.id as game_template_id, 
                    g.id as id,
                    g.closed as closed,
                    g.access_code as access_code
                from 
                    bingo.games as g
                inner join
                    bingo.game_templates as gt on g.game_template_id = gt.id
                where 
                    g.access_code = $1

daebf773a00bdc37be8845f8b30daf164f85338d.query: update bingo.players set username = $1 where user_id = $2 and game_id = $3

e2e2c27f59c63442db1487e3418c9653a69c6474.query:
select 
                f.id as id,
                f.checked as checked,
                ft.caption as caption
            from bingo.fields as f
            inner join bingo.field_templates as ft 
                on f.field_template_id = ft.id
            where 
                f.game_id = $1 and f.user_id = $2
            order by 
                position

e3619dc276ca60a08c26329377311037d4e5c475.query:
insert into bingo.games (game_template_id, access_code, created_by)
            values ($1, $2, $3)
            returning *
